name: Balmoral BO Blockout Linked Roller Blind
shortDescription: Balmoral blockout blinds provide elegance and premium design in a variety of colors. Perfect for wide windows and sliding doors, these linked roller blinds ensure smooth gliding, UV protection, and light control.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Smooth Gliding UV Protective Roller Blinds
longDescription:
The Balmoral Armour Blockout Blind is a sophisticated choice for Linked Roller Blinds, ideal for wide windows and sliding doors. Crafted from 100% polyester with an acrylic foam coating, it ensures complete light exclusion and meets AS 2663 1999 blockout standards. Available in a generous 3,000mm width, it offers a weight of 390gsm and a thickness of 0.60mm.

This linked roller system provides excellent light control, UV protection, and privacy, making it a versatile window treatment. Its design allows for smooth operation, with options for chain or motorised control, ensuring a contemporary and minimalist look. The fabric's light fastness is rated ?5 on the Blue Wool Scale, and it meets flame retardant standards for Class 2 to 9 buildings.

Compatible with blockout, sunscreen, or light-filtering fabrics, it offers thermal efficiency and visual consistency. Easy to maintain with a vacuum or soft cloth, this interior shading solution is perfect for homeowners, designers, and specifiers seeking a coordinated fabric range.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

name: Linesque BO Blockout Linked Roller Blind
shortDescription: Linked roller blind offers smooth operation for wide windows and sliding doors, providing UV protection and complete light control.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Seamless coverage and control for wide windows
longDescription:
The Linesque BO Blockout Blind offers exceptional light exclusion, ideal for spaces requiring complete privacy and darkness. Made from 100% polyester with an acrylic coating, this blackout fabric is robust, weighing 431gsm with a thickness of 0.65mm. Perfect for linked roller blinds, it is PVC and lead-free. The Almond hue provides a sophisticated, neutral touch, enhancing various interior styles. With high tear resistance and light fastness (Blue Scale 6), it complies with the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9(a) buildings and is fire-tested to AS 1530 Part III. Greenguard Gold certified, it is suitable for sensitive environments like schools and healthcare facilities. Easy to maintain with a soft cloth or duster, it ensures durable performance and a pristine finish.

Linked roller blinds are ideal for wide windows and sliding doors, offering smooth operation and a contemporary look. They provide excellent light control, UV protection, and privacy, compatible with blockout, sunscreen, or light-filtering fabrics. Featuring a track-mounted design, they offer chain or motorised operation and coordinated fabric ranges. These window treatments, part of a linked roller system, deliver interior shading with a minimalist design and thermal efficiency, appealing to homeowners, designers, and specifiers.
careInstructions:
Surface dust should be removed with duster or soft cloth.
Never use abrasive products or solvent/industrial based cleaners.

The Linesque BO Blockout Blind offers exceptional light exclusion, ideal for spaces requiring complete privacy and darkness. Made from 100% polyester with an acrylic coating, this blackout fabric is robust, weighing 431gsm with a thickness of 0.65mm. Perfect for linked roller blinds, it is PVC and lead-free. The Almond hue provides a sophisticated, neutral touch, enhancing various interior styles. With high tear resistance and light fastness (Blue Scale 6), it complies with the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9(a) buildings and is fire-tested to AS 1530 Part III. Greenguard Gold certified, it is suitable for sensitive environments like schools and healthcare facilities. Easy to maintain with a soft cloth or duster, it ensures durable performance and a pristine finish.

Linked roller blinds are ideal for wide windows and sliding doors, offering smooth operation and a contemporary look. They provide excellent light control, UV protection, and privacy, compatible with blockout, sunscreen, or light-filtering fabrics. Featuring a track-mounted design, they offer chain or motorised operation and coordinated fabric ranges. These window treatments, part of a linked roller system, deliver interior shading with a minimalist design and thermal efficiency, appealing to homeowners, designers, and specifiers.
careInstructions:
Surface dust should be removed with duster or soft cloth.
Never use abrasive products or solvent/industrial based cleaners.

The Focus Blockout Blind offers exceptional light exclusion and durability, perfect for linked roller blinds on wide windows and sliding doors. Made from 100% polyester with a pigmented acrylic coating, it provides a smooth finish and effective room darkening for both residential and commercial spaces. Available in widths of 3200mm, 2200mm, 127mm, and 89mm, it is ideal for roller blind applications. With a weight of 380gsm and a thickness of 0.40mm, it ensures a balance of flexibility and durability.

Tested to AS 2663 1999 standards for blockout performance and featuring a light fastness rating of 7 or higher on the Blue Wool Scale, the Focus blind maintains its color over time. It meets the Building Code of Australia for flame retardancy in class 2 to 9 buildings and is odour-free and hygiene-friendly.

The linked roller blind design allows for smooth operation, with options for wand or motorised control, and a coordinated fabric range enhances its contemporary look. This system provides excellent light control, UV protection, privacy, and compatibility with blockout, sunscreen, or light-filtering fabrics. Easy to maintain with a vacuum or soft cloth, it is a practical, low-maintenance window treatment solution, offering thermal efficiency and a minimalist design for homeowners, designers, and specifiers.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.
